title: New: Purity Ring – Obedear
content:
It’s a true testament to just how far dreampop duo Purity Ring have come that when they announced new track Obedear earlier this morning, it almost immediately began trending on Twitter.

With their debut LP Shrines out 24 July on 4AD, anticipation is guaranteed to only increase from here on out, especially if they maintain the level of quality that Obedear portrays. A swirling, majestic track, Purity Ring may well prove to be the most important dreampop group since Cocteau Twins.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
